contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=February 2008}} {{for|the military unit|4th (Quetta) Division}} '''Quetta Division''' was an administrative division of the [[Balochistan Province]] of [[Pakistan]], until the reforms of 2000 abolished the third tier of government. ==See also== * [[Quetta District]] {{Neighbourhoods of Quetta}} {{PakistanDivisions}} {{coord|30|15|N|68|30|E|region:PK_type:adm2nd_source:GNS-enwiki|display=title}} {{Baluchistan-geo-stub}} [[Category:Divisions of Pakistan]]
